LightningComponentBundle.description: Ontario Design System button component with optional icon support. Supports primary, secondary, and tertiary button types.

property.name: label
property.label: Label
property.description: Text to be displayed within the button.

property.name: url
property.label: Target URL
property.description: URL the button will take the user to when clicked.

property.name: icon
property.label: Icon
property.description: Optional icon to display. Available icons: add, remove, edit, delete, chevronLeft, chevronRight, arrowForward, arrowBack, search, download, upload, check, close, info, warning, error, refresh, home, print, save

property.name: iconPosition
property.label: Icon position
property.description: Position of the icon relative to the label.

property.name: ariaLabelText
property.label: Aria label text
property.description: Provides more context as to what the button interaction is doing (for accessibility).

property.name: elementId
property.label: Element Id
property.description: The unique identifier of the button. Optional - if not provided, one will be generated.

property.name: className
property.label: Class name
property.description: Additional CSS class to be applied.
